page.title: 07EMPLOYMENT IN GODMERSHAM
page.content: PROFESSIONAL & MANAGERIAL 37 19% SELF-EMPLOYED 10 5% SHOP/OFFICE WORKERS 25 13% MANUAL WORKERS 31 16% UNEMPLOYED 4 2% STUDENTS 14 7% RETIRED 57 29% HOUSEWIVES ETC 17 9% 195 100% This table reflects the fact that the very pleasant rural area, with good communications attracts a high proportion of retired people, many previously in professional and managerial posts. The majority currently employed are in middle class employment. The table includes women workers, a high proportion of whom are married and work part time. The percentage of unemployed people is well below the national average.
